keyword: protein style in n out calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Protein Style Burger
meta_description: Discover protein style in n out calories for one burger: about 240 kcal with low carbs, high protein, plus full nutrition breakdown and tweaks.
h1: Calories in In-N-Out Protein Style Burger
assumptions: Standard single patty Protein Style Hamburger: 100% beef patty, lettuce wrap, tomato, onion, spread; no bun, cheese, or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and preparation; values based on In-N-Out standard info. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out Protein Style Hamburger provides 240 kcal and 16 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with menu info.

tweaks.label: Make it a Double-Double (add second patty and cheese)

faqs.q: How many calories in protein style in n out hamburger?
faqs.a: About 240 kcal for one standard Protein Style Hamburger.

faqs.q: What's the protein in In-N-Out Protein Style?
faqs.a: 16 g protein per burger, mainly from the beef patty.

faqs.q: Are carbs low in protein style in n out?
faqs.a: Yes, only 11 g carbs due to no bun, from veggies and spread.

faqs.q: How does Protein Style compare to regular In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Protein Style saves ~200 kcal by skipping the bun, reducing carbs significantly.

faqs.q: Sodium in protein style in n out calories info?
faqs.a: Around 650 mg sodium per burger, mostly from the patty and spread.
